span.p: K-8 Crestwood classrooms utilize PAX to provide a peaceful and productive environment for all students. Each week, we will be sending out new videos to learn more about PAX and how it can be implemented at home.
This first video explains more about PAX and its purpose as well as the benefits of implementing these positive parenting strategies at home.
The next video is all about the PAX vision. Each classroom has a student led PAX vision to help establish expectations. Children can help create PAX visions at home too!

div.a: We Are There For You! We Miss You!

span.style: display: inline !important; float: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 18.06px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;

p.span: The Crestwood Local School District Staff put together a video to show how much they miss all of our students. We are so proud of their hardwork during this time and can't wait to see them in our buildings soon!

a.title: Click to read more about: We Are There For You! We Miss You!
